mapper.sql: id, order_id, user_id, product_id, product_name, order_no, product_img, product_price, product_quantity, create_time, product_attr, order_status
mapper.select:
select
from order_item
and (order_no like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%'))
and (product_id like CONCAT('%',#{productId},'%'))
and (user_id like CONCAT('%',#{userId},'%'))
and (id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%'))
order by id desc
limit #{start},#{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into order_item (order_id, user_id, product_id, product_name, order_no, product_img, product_price, product_quantity, create_time, product_attr) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update order_item
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

product_attr = #{productAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_item set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_img = #{productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_price = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_quantity = #{productQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, product_attr = #{productAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

insert into order_item (order_id, user_id, product_id, product_name, order_no, product_img, product_price, product_quantity, create_time, product_attr, order_status) VALUES
(#{item.orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.productQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.productAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
